ORDER BY a.nxAccommodationSeq DESC

SELECT a.nxAccommodationSeq ,a.region ,a.hotelType ,a.hotelName ,a.hotelIntroduce ,a.addressZip ,a.address ,a.adressDetail ,a.lng ,a.lat ,a.checkin ,a.checkout ,a.delNy ,a.regDateTime ,a.modDateTime FROM nxAccommodation a WHERE 1=1 AND a.nxAccommodationSeq = #{nxAccommodationSeq}
SELECT seq ,type ,defaultNy ,sort ,path ,originalName ,uuidName ,pseq FROM kiwi.nxAccommodationUploaded WHERE 1=1 AND delNy = 0 AND pseq = #{nxAccommodationSeq} ORDER BY type, sort
